Cricket 501 Shuttle- Single (Adult).name: Cricket 501 Shuttle- Single (Adult)
Cricket 501 Shuttle- Single (Adult).subline: Valid for a single journey on the Edgbaston 501 Shuttle Service

info.val: This Shuttle Bus service will be available for selected fixtures in 2021. Please check the specific fixture Spectator Guide for more details about the match you are attending.

The 501 Shuttle Bus pick-up point is located right outside New Street Station on Smallbrook Queensway (opposite TK Maxx and close to the Bullring). The Service is convenient for users of both New Street and Moor Street Train Stations.
Buses will be returning back from the stadium to the city centre after the close of play.
Each ticket can be activated only once and so do not activate your ticket until you are ready to travel.
Tickets are valid for use up to 30 days from the day of purchase.
If you are travelling with young children you cna buy additional tickets on one device on their behalf and activate multiple tickets simulateneously.

This is a discounted ticket designed for students studying for 12 or more hours per week. You will be asked to provide evidence of your entitlement to student-rate travel and you should carry your college or university issues Student ID card with you for inspection by a member of staff if requested.
